doc.title: Cultures - Das achte Weltwunder
doc.plot: "8th Wonder of the World" is part of the widely popular RTS game series "Cultures", originating from Germany, and the successor of the well-known and successful "Cultures 2 - The Gates of Asgard" and "Northland". A few years after the happenings in Northland, Bjarni, our viking hero and his brave comrades return to their homes after their last adventures and are living happily together with their families. Life was peaceful again, but after some time, evil rises again to bring hatred, anger and death to the world. Our heroes must set out again to stop the evil forces from taking over the world. A new adventure unfolds before the eyes of Bjarni and his friends.
